sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>getPiUserId</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
   var jsonData ={};
	//var name = 'CCR Genomic Data Sharing Plan';
	var last_name = request.queryParams.last;
	var first_name = request.queryParams.first;
	
	var pi_item = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
	pi_item.addQuery('first_name', first_name);
	pi_item.addQuery('last_name', last_name);
	pi_item.query();
	if(pi_item.getRowCount() > 0){
		pi_item.next();
		jsonData.id = pi_item.sys_id;
	}else{
		jsonData.id="n/a";
	}
  return jsonData;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/gdspapi/getPiUserId</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/getPiUserId</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-07-20 18:59:57</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>1ecf968adb084700f59974131f9619d5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getPiUserId</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_1ecf968adb084700f59974131f9619d5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-07-20 19:28:02</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="gdspAPI">212601dedb4e7a00f59974131f961986</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: RoleApproverApproval StatusCommentsTime' for(i = 0; i < comments .length; i++){ if (comments[i].length > 40) { if (comments[i][0] == '\n') { var lastI = 0; while (lastI < comments[i].length && comments[i][lastI] == '\n') lastI ++; comments[i] = comments[i].substring(lastI,comments[i].length); } var t = comments[i].substring(0,22); var approver = comments[i].substring(comments[i].indexOf('(ENDROLE)')+9,comments[i].length); var results = comments[i].substring(comments[i].indexOf('(Additional comments)') + 57,comments[i].indexOf('(Additional comments)') + 65); var comm= comments[i].substring(comments[i].indexOf('(Additional comments)') + 66, comments[i].indexOf('(role)')); var role = comments[i].substring(comments[i].indexOf('(role)') + 6, comments[i].indexOf('(ENDROLE)')); commentsblock = commentsblock + ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + "" + role + ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + "" + approver + ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + "" + results+ ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + "" + comm + ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + "" + t + ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + ""; } } commentsblock = commentsblock + ""; return commentsblock; } function loadSubmittedData(data){ for(key in data){ var value = getValue(key, data[key]); $('#'+key+"1").html(value); } } function loadResubmittedData(data){ for(key in data){ setResubmitValue(key, data[key]); } } function getValue(name, value){ if(textFields.indexOf(name) != -1 ){ if(name == 'date'){ return getConvertedValue(value, '1'); }else{ return value; } }else{ if(value == "true"){ return ''; }else{ return ''; } return value; } } function setResubmitValue(name, value){ if(textFields.indexOf(name) != -1 ){ if(name == 'date'){ $('#'+name).val(getConvertedValue(value, '1')); }else{ $('#'+name).val(value); } }else{ if(value == "true"){ $('#'+name).prop('checked', true); }else{ $('#'+name).prop('checked', false); } otherFieldWatcher(name, value); } } function otherFieldWatcher(name, value){ var otherCheckbox = ['otherType', 'otherAnalysis', 'OtherRepository', 'clinicalData', 'protocol', 'instrument', 'otherCompanion', 'otherSubmission', 'yeast', 'bacteria', 'nonHuman', 'snpArrayData', 'expressionArray', 'methylationArray', 'arrayDerive','microarrayData','sequenceData','somaticSnv','arrayCgh','wholeGenome','wholeExome','targetGenome','targetExome','wholeTranscriptome','targetTrabscriptome','epigenomicMark','sanger','rrna']; var otherField = ['specifyOtherType', 'spcifiedOtherAnalysis', 'specifiedRepository', 'specifiedClinicalData', 'specifiedProtocol', 'specifiedInstrument', 'specifiedCompanion', 'psecifiedOtherSubmission', 'yeastSpecies', 'bacteriaSpecies','noHumanOther', 'numSNP', 'numExpression', 'numMethylation', 'numDerivedGenotype', 'numMicroarrayData','numSquenceData','numSomaticSnv','numArrayCgh','numWholeGenome','numWholeExome','numTargetGenome','numTargetedExome','numWholeTranscriptome','numTargetedTranscriptome','numEpigenomic','numSanger','numRrna']; var index = otherCheckbox.indexOf(name); if( index >= 0){ if(value == 'true'){ $('#'+otherField[index]).prop('disabled', false); }else{ $('#'+otherField[index]).prop('disabled', true); } } } function getConvertedValue(value, flag){ if(flag == '0'){ var values = value.split('/'); return values[0]+'-'+values[1] + '-' + values[2]; }else { var values = value.split('-'); return values[0]+'/'+values[1] + '/' + values[2]; } } function resetRequestValue(){ var i = 0; for( i = 0; i!= names.length; sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>POST</http_method><name>saveRequestData</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	  var jsonData = [];
	  var variables = {};
	  var body = request.body.data; 
	  var action = body.action;
	  var requested_for = body.requested_for;
	  var application = body.application;
	  var value = body.value;
	  var project_name = body.project_name;
	  var saved_id = body.saved_id;
	  var answers_sys_id = '';
	  var save_submission = '';
	
	  if (action != null && action == 'DELETE') {
		  if (saved_id != '') {
			save_submission = new GlideRecord('u_gdsp_user_submission');
			save_submission.addQuery('sys_id',saved_id);
			save_submission.query();
			save_submission.next();
			answers_sys_id = save_submission.deleteRecord();
		  }
	  }else {
		  if (saved_id=='') {
			save_submission = new GlideRecord('u_gdsp_user_submission');
			save_submission.initialize();
			save_submission.u_value = value;
			save_submission.u_userid = requested_for; 
			save_submission.u_application = application;  
			save_submission.u_project_name = project_name; 
			save_submission.u_application = 'GDSP';
			var comments = body.comments;
			save_submission.u_comments = comments;
			answers_sys_id = save_submission.insert();
		  }else {
			save_submission = new GlideRecord('u_gdsp_user_submission');
			save_submission.addQuery('sys_id',saved_id);
			save_submission.query();
			save_submission.next();

			save_submission.u_value = value;
			save_submission.u_userid = requested_for; 
			save_submission.u_application = application;
			save_submission.u_project_name = project_name; 
			save_submission.u_application = 'GDSP';
			answers_sys_id = save_submission.update();
		  }
	  }
	  jsonData.push({
	  	projectName: project_name,
		value : saved_id,
		action: action
	  });
	  return jsonData;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/gdspapi/saveRequestData</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/saveRequestData</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-12 21:04:08</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>ec5681dedb4e7a00f59974131f961950</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>saveRequestData</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_ec5681dedb4e7a00f59974131f961950</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-07-21 14:28:19</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="gdspAPI">212601dedb4e7a00f59974131f961986</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>
